translations: v.付给……报酬（remunerate 的过去式）

phrs.translation: 收取报酬, 获支付酬金
以及有充分结构的财政援助, 消除惩罚其产品的保护主义壁垒
妇女所作有报酬的贡献
有适当和充分报酬的就业

sentences.sentence: You will be remunerated and so will your staff.
sentences.translation: 你将会得到报酬，你的员工也会。

sentences.sentence: The underlined word "remunerated" in the passage means "Many people believe that yellowing and wetness are the greatest enemies of stamps".
sentences.translation: 文中带下划线的“酬劳”一词的意思是“许多人认为发黄和潮湿是邮票最大的敌人。”

sentences.sentence: A person should be remunerated for his work.
sentences.translation: 一个人做了工作，就要得到报酬。
